brainly_data.question:
Which of these quotes most likely came from an average person living under the theocratic rule of the Ayatollah Khomeini in Iran?


“At last we have rooted out the shah’s corrupt government and live under the true law of Islam.”


“Our economy flourishes now, thanks to our good relations with both Iraq and the United States.” 


“Our public discussions of political and religious issues makes our society lively and strong.” 


“Combining western ideas with our faith in Islam, we will lead our country into a great future.”
brainly_data.subject: History
